string-array.name: tut_history
string-array.item: To revert to a previous step,
touch the step and hold.

string-array.name: tut_hitsolve
string-array.item: Tap Solve to start manipulating your equation.

string-array.name: tut_powerdrag
string-array.item: To take the root of both sides,
drag an exponent to the other side.

string-array.name: tut_power
string-array.item: To raise a term to its exponent,
double tap the exponent.

string-array.name: tut_rootdrag
string-array.item: To square both sides,
drag a square root sign to the other side.

string-array.name: tut_root
string-array.item: Double tap a square root sign
to square root of its contents.

resources.string: Hit the back button to enter another equation.

string-array.name: tut_solvemessage_2
string-array.item: To move numbers or variables around,
simply drag and drop them.

string-array.name: tut_solvemessage_3
string-array.item: To add, subtract, multiply or divide,
double tap on +, -, ร or รท.

string-array.name: tut_add
string-array.item: To add/subtract a term from both sides,
drag the term to the other side.

string-array.name: tut_div
string-array.item: To multiply both sides by a term,
drag the term to the other side.

string-array.name: tut_multi
string-array.item: To divide both sides by a term
drag the term to the other side.

resources.string: Go ahead and type an equation.
You can tap on these messages to skip them.
